description.description: A detailed description of the event.

date.description: The date and time of the event.

price.description: The price of a ticket for the event.

committeeId.description: Reference to the Committee organizing the event.

imageUrl.description: URL of the event poster image.

Committee.title: Committee
Committee.description: Represents a campus committee organizing events.

logoUrl.description: URL of the committee's logo image.

Booking.title: Booking
Booking.description: Represents a booking made by a student for an event.

eventId.description: Reference to the Event that was booked.

userId.description: Reference to the User who made the booking.

bookingDate.description: The date and time the booking was made.

qrCode.description: The QR code associated with the ticket.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user (student) in the system.  Authentication data is not stored here.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (from Firebase Auth).

name.description: The full name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

/events/{eventId}.description: Stores all event documents in a single top-level collection for easy querying.

/users/{userId}/bookings/{bookingId}.description: Stores event bookings made by a specific user. Path-based ownership guarantees user-specific read/write access.
